text: Nudɨ 16.14 1 Ko 15.5 kulemɨlɨ human limu limu sɨkuala hɨcɨ limu pabiŋ cɨjɨŋ haman agɨlaŋ sɨmɨŋ nanaŋ hɨnevɨmalɨ. Nanaŋ hɨnevɨdaci Jisasɨ nulɨdɨ hɨvɨ iakamalɨ. Iaka nudɨ kulemɨlɨ agɨladɨ abacabɨlamalɨ. Nɨbu cɨku hɨki iakamalɨ agasaŋ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ ma lamavɨmalɨ agasaŋ abacabɨlamalɨ. Nulɨdɨ hɨji humɨgaŋ ci sɨjevɨmalɨ saja kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlaŋ vebeŋ abavɨdaci nɨbɨlaŋ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ ma lamavɨmalɨ.
